Key Match Events: Di Maria scored a reverse pass from Christian Romero to open the scoring in the 40th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi was sidelined for the first half due to a right hamstring injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni emphasized the importance of competing and feeling the sensation of wearing the shirt before the Copa Am√©rica.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Messi returned to the international stage for the first time in six months.
Messi is tied with Gonzalo Higuain for the fifth-most goals in Argentina's history with 31 goals and is four scores behind Diego Maradona at No. 4.
Others: Argentina has not fallen in its last seven meetings with Ecuador, a streak dating back to 2019.
